channel.title: Comments on: Lotusphere Session Times Released

item.title: By: Duffbert
item.dc:creator: Duffbert
item.description: <p>There BETTER be repeats! Actually, let me rephrase that... Y'all come to see Chris and I Monday at 1 pm, and then the REST of you can repeat your sessions!<br /><br />Yeah, that's the ticket. Although the warfare between SW 5-6 and SW 7-10 is gonna be brutal...<br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
There BETTER be repeats! Actually, let me rephrase that… Y’all come to see Chris and I Monday at 1 pm, and then the REST of you can repeat your sessions!

Yeah, that’s the ticket. Although the warfare between SW 5-6 and SW 7-10 is gonna be brutal…

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I know it's going to be a tough one, though I have heard on the grapevine that there will be repeats of some of those competing sessions.</p>
item.content:encoded: I know it’s going to be a tough one, though I have heard on the grapevine that there will be repeats of some of those competing sessions.

item.title: By: Curt Stone
item.dc:creator: Curt Stone
item.description: <p>WTF with Monday at 1pm? There's about 5-6 sessions I would attend.</p>
item.content:encoded: WTF with Monday at 1pm? There’s about 5-6 sessions I would attend.
